    "entries": [

            "description": "Lithophone and other pigments and preparations based on zinc sulphide.",

        {

        },
        {
            "description": "Polysulphites, polysulphones and other products specified in Note 3 to this chapter, n.e.s. or included, in primary form._x000D_\r\n",

        },
        {
            "description": "-- Other telephones for cellular networks or for other wireless networks",

        },
        {
            "description": "-- Other parts of telephone sets, including smartphones and other telephones, including telephones for cellular networks or for other wireless networks; other apparatus for the transmission or reception of voice, images or other data, including apparatus for communication in a wired or wireless network (such as a local or wide area network), other than transmission or reception apparatus of heading 84.43, 85.25, 85.27 or 85.28",
